hydros

Python library for Hydros21 or Decagon CDT-10 water level sensor. * Author(s): Colby Sawyer Implementation Notes ——————– Hardware: * Hydros 21 Conductivity, Temperature, and Depth Sensor

Software and Dependencies:

class devices.hydros.Hydros(water_depth=0, temperature=0, conductivity=0)[source]

Bases: object

Driver for Hydros 12 or Decagon CDT-10 water level sensors

get_data()[source]

Collects data from the device attached to the SDI-12 USB external board

Raises:

ValueError: [Throws error if device is not found] ValueError: [Throws error if device readings are not properly formatted after parsing (invalid readings)]

Returns:

[Bytearray]: [Packaged up data to be sent via LoRa driving code]

parse_reading()[source]

Takes string of values from sensor and parses them into String list

Args:

val (String): [Unparsed string containing multiple reading from sensor ex. “0+40+24.4-140”]

Returns:

[String]: [Parsed list of strings each corresponding to a returned measurement ex. [“0”,”+40”,”+24.4”,”-140”]
